questions.question: During which time period did Scientific Applications first appear?
What are the most common data structures used in Scientific Applications?
Scientific applications are characterized by large numbers of floating-point computations.
Which of the following were the most common control structures in early Scientific Applications?
Which language is a primary example of a Business Application language developed in the 1950s?
Business languages are designed with facilities to produce elaborate reports.
Business applications primarily require precise ways of describing and storing which type of data?
Early Artificial Intelligence programming focused on manipulating __________ rather than numbers.
LISP and Prolog are frequently associated with the use of linked lists in AI.
Which of the following is NOT listed as a modern language used for new AI systems?
Why does Systems Programming require high efficiency?
options: Because it is used for symbolic processing
Because it only uses linked lists
Because it is only used on mobile phones

questions.question: Web software uses an eclectic collection of languages including markup, scripting, and general-purpose languages.
In the context of Web Software, XHTML is categorized as a:
Which language is given as an example of a general-purpose language used in Web Software?
ALGOL 60 is an example of a language used for Business Applications.
